channel.title: Tridence 718 [Huge]
channel.description:
[img]http://imageshack.us/scaled/landing/42/tujf.png[/img]
Welcome to the amazing server of Tridence! As a just-starting of server, we need players. As a play in Tridence, you will have so much to do as in mini-games, boss battles, holiday events, double-xp weekends, All skills trainable and working properly (with fully functional summoning), a fully functional Grand Exchange, some new custom areas, a nice opportunity for donators, very nice staff, a very active website with a web-client, screen-shots, the server status, latest news and updates, as well as a forums page (Created by the Senior Moderator: Tyler) where you can also get a lot of information, report bugs, talk to everyone around the server, read the rules, contact any of the staff members, and a lot more! Enjoy the server with friendly and active staff and hopefully users soon to come! [IMG]http://imageshack.com/scaled/800x600/401/wskq.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.com/scaled/800x600/703/u1mx.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.com/scaled/800x600/17/onnf.png[/img] With a ton of stuff to do, and members to play with, there will always be something to do in the magnificent world of Tridence! With all new updates, areas, and events coming soon and can be suggested by the members- there will usually be new areas to explore at least every month! [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qjsZlyJ9SYM[/youtube] With all duplication glitches, and unfair advantages fixed, you will always be able to keep up with any users you wish and battle it out in the Fight-Pits, the wilderness, or even castle wars!
Learn More, Read More, The Webclient, The Downloadable Client, News Feeds, Latest Updates, and Forums are all located here: [size=18pt][url=http://tridence718.webege.com/]http://tridence718.webege.com/[/url][/size]
